name: Infinite Swords Master
description:
My submition to the brackeys 2021/2 gamejam :D

The game is a 3D Third Person Action Hack&Slash where you have to kill goblins using your infinite swordstyle. Basically, there are many many swords spread in the ground and you can pick them up, swing them and throw it at your enemies to cause damage and kill them.

The game has a tutorial and 5 more levels. Pay attention to the tuttorial as there are some not very intuitive mechanics :D

ATTENTION: IF YOU DIE IN THE GAME ,YOU DIE IN REAL LIFE you have to press "esc" -> "Restart" to restart the level. 

In case you end up closing the game and want to try again a specific level, just type the number of the level in the little box in the menu and hit "Seleect Level"
